memberdef.name: AddModdedDaemon

briefdescription.para: Adds a modded Daemon via the interface id string to the Computer.

simplesect.para: The modded Daemon instance.

parameterdescription.para: The input for the LoadInstance interface function.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves a List of daemons exactly of Daemon from the Computer
Retrieves a List of Daemons whose Type is or is derived from T, pulled from Computer

parameterdescription.para: The Type or derivative of the type to search for in the Daemon List

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the first Daemon.Instance whose interface Type is exactly modInterface.
Retrieves the first mod Daemon.Instance whose interface Type is or is derived from T.

parameterdescription.para: The Type or derivative of the type to search for in the Daemon List

briefdescription.para: Retrieves a List of Daemon.Instance whose interface Type is exactly modInterface.
Retrieves a List of mod Daemon.Instance whose interface Type is or is derived from T

parameterdescription.para: The Type or derivative of the type to search for in the Daemon List

briefdescription.para: Adds a link on the NetworkMap from Computer connecting to newLink.

simplesect.para: true, if the link was added, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the NetworkMap of Computer.
